name: Symphogear XD UNLIMITED
description:
These fists, and this game... they are my Symphogear!
Based on the anime series, Symphogear, Symphogear XD UNLIMITED is a thrilling mobile symphonic battle RPG with loads of app-exclusive stories!
・These young girls' songs will ring out across the battlefield.
Symphogear XD UNLIMITED is recommended for players who want...
・A symphony of girls, RPGs, action, and music
・To experience the world of Symphogear wherever they go.
・To hear exclusive music tracks not heard in the anime.
・An exciting new mobile RPG.
・To experience an emotional RPG story.
・An easy to pick up and play, yet visually exciting RPG.
・A free mobile RPG.
・To see more heart-pounding Symphogear action.
・To form parties and fight using their favorite characters from Symphogear.
・To see a whole new side of characters from the Symphogear anime.
・To take down their enemies while listening to thrilling music.
...and for fans of...
・The anime series, Symphogear.
・The band, Elements Garden.
・Over-the-top, heart-pounding RPG action.
Main Theme
Nana Mizuki, UNLIMITED BEAT
Cast
Aoi Yuki, Ayahi Takagaki, Yoko Hikasa, Yoshino Nanjo, Ai Kayano, Minami Takayama, Yuka Iguchi, Yui Horie, and more
Defeat your enemies through the power of music in this symphonic battle RPG!
Discover all new game-exclusive special attacks and stand with other gear wielders against the forces of evil!
Relive the Symphogear anime, and enjoy app-exclusive stories!
Relive the anime through the main quest, and
experience all new original scenarios through the side quests and event quests
which will be continually added!
A wielder dream battle!
Battle against players from around the world in the Battle Arena!
See how far your hand-picked team of wielders can take you!
Your own music box!
Unlock new songs as you progress through the game!
Each song has a different effect that will change the outcome of battle!
There are tons of songs to unlock, and you can level them up to make them even more powerful!
Songs

Music: Elements Garden
